Here is what I did step by step.

1. Downloaded the torrent for word and the torrent for poweriso.

2. Got poweriso working and put the iso file for word into it.

3. The only thing that I know to do on poweriso is mount an iso to a drive so I mounted it to a free drive and opened it up from my computer.

4. Completed the setup and entered the 25 key code.

Installed per instructions, not a hitch--as always!  I have never missed installing on the first attempt and have picked up 34 of your finest offerings.  

As an intelligent disabled person, mental stimulation is a necessity. Your efforts have provided much. I cannot afford to purchase, and sincerely appreciate what you do. 

To those who insult Thethingie when an install goes bad . . . 

Please be kind and realize that there is a high probability that difficulties are emanating from faulty synaptic transmissions on your end.   Consider both your postsynaptic potentials and signaling cascades. It could also be memory failure.

Of course, following the instructions carefully, exactly as written--step--by--step, slowly and accurately also helps.
